pages.title: Natura
pages.text: Natura is a mod that aims to spice up the world with interesting worldgen. With a few small additions, hunger no longer has to be about hunting animals early game. Natura is mainly an addon for Tinkers Construct.$(br2)$(l:https://hexxit.fandom.com/wiki/Natura)Natura Wiki$(/l)

pages.title: Features
pages.text: - New Trees & wood types$(br2)- New crops, berries & ingredients$(br2)- Tinkers Construct implementations$(br2)- Some additional cosmetic blocks.
